mapper.sql: id, fukuanId, orderId, hsId, amount, capitalId, useInterest, useDays, jiekuanDate,deleted, tsc, tsu
mapper.select:
select jiekuan.id AS jiekuanId, jiekuan.fukuanId , jiekuan.orderId AS jiekuanOrderId, jiekuan.hsId AS jiekuanHsId, jiekuan.amount, jiekuan.jiekuanDate, jiekuan.capitalId , jiekuan.useInterest, jiekuan.useDays ,
huankuanmap.id AS mapId, huankuanmap.jiekuanId AS mapJiekuanId, huankuanmap.huankuanId AS mapHuankuanId, huankuanmap.principal , huankuanmap.interest , huankuanmap.fee,
huankuan.id AS huankuanId, huankuan.huankuankDate, huankuan.tsc, huankuan.tsu
from hs_same_jiekuan jiekuan LEFT JOIN hs_same_huankuan_map huankuanmap ON jiekuan.id=huankuanmap.jiekuanId LEFT JOIN hs_same_huankuan huankuan ON huankuanmap.huankuanId=huankuan.id where jiekuan.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and jiekuan.deleted=0

SELECT jiekuan.id, jiekuan.fukuanId, jiekuan.orderId, jiekuan.hsId, jiekuan.amount, jiekuan.capitalId, jiekuan.useInterest, jiekuan.useDays, jiekuan.deleted, jiekuan.tsc, jiekuan.tsu FROM hs_same_huankuan_map huankuannmap LEFT JOIN hs_same_jiekuan jiekuan ON jiekuan.id=huankuannmap.jiekuanId where huankuannmap.huankuanId = #{huankuanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: UPDATE hs_same_jiekuan SET deleted = 1, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO hs_same_jiekuan ( id, fukuanId, orderId, hsId , amount, capitalId, useInterest, useDays, jiekuanDate, tsc, tsu )VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fukuanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{capitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jiekuanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
fukuanId,
orderId,
hsId,

tsu,

mapper.update:
update hs_same_jiekuan
fukuanId = #{fukuanId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
capitalId = #{capitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
useInterest = #{useInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
useDays = #{useDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
tsc = #{jiekuanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tsu = #{tsu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE hs_same_jiekuan SET fukuanId = #{fukuanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, capitalId = #{capitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, useInterest = #{useInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, useDays = #{useDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiekuanDate = #{jiekuanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = #{tsu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
